item.title: Trump’s mixed messages on Jan. 6 pardons
item.description: Trump’s comments point to huge numbers of pardons, but he has offered mixed signals on things like pardoning those who assaulted police.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren asks Trump to set conflict-of-interest rules for Musk
item.description: The letter from the Massachusetts senator comes as Musk has taken a prominent role inside Trump’s orbit
